intro: Memecylon globosum, commonly known as the globe memecylon, is a species of flowering plant in the family Meliaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific Islands. Memecylon globosum is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and along stream banks.
